message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. Would you be willing to consider that price?

I understand you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not convinced the product is worth $9500 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $7500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'll make a new offer of $9000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for a product of this quality

I understand you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not convinced the product is worth $9000 to me. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $8250. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I'll make a new offer of $8750. I think this is a fair price for a product of this quality, and I'm willing to compromise to get the deal done

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still not convinced the product is worth $8750 to me. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $8125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the lower end of my price range, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'll make a new offer of $9000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer
